title: LF ADC/ JG Serious Rank 5s- S5 Team. Diamond +++ ONLY!!!
body:
Greetings all, we currently in need of a ADC thats diamond ++ as title said. We already got 3 solid member on the team and we get along great.
We will practice almost daily, and when we don't play 5s, solo/duo q will be needed. Our team can easily get to Diamond 5 at least easily and we still improving. We will also be doing tourneys when ready.

This is a LONG TERM TEAM, we treat each other as friends and with respect.

After that being said here are the requirements(is a MUST):
-Diamond +
-Have Mic with no background noise
-Friendly/ positive attitude
-Willing to learn new champs and learn new things
-Listen to shot caller

We will be looking info up on your most played champ, and recent games.

Application(You can add me, BUT to do tryout, a app is a MUST):
IGN:
Rank in all season you played:
Top ADC/JG(at least 3):
Timezone/Availability:
Competitive experience:
Can you shot call?

Rate the following 1--- 5. With 1 being poor and 5 Confident.
Shot calling:
How well you know you role:
Dedication/commitment: 
Do you like to talk:
Do you prefer to listen:

replies.body:
GN: selfz
Rank in all season you played: s2:silver, s3 plat S4: d2
Top ADC/JG(at least 3): lee,vi,kha
Timezone/Availability: ezt, anytime
Competitive experience: almsot 2 years
Can you shot call? in every team im the shotcaller

Rate the following 1--- 5. With 1 being poor and 5 Confident.
Shot calling: 5
How well you know you role: 5
Dedication/commitment: 5
Do you like to talk: 4
Do you prefer to listen:2

IGN: omits
Rank in all season you played: season 2 didn't do rank, season 3 gold, season 4 D5
Top ADC/JG(at least 3): Lucian twitch corki cait jinx
Timezone/Availability: PST and anytime
Competitive experience: have done tournaments before NGG mobafire
Can you shot call? yes

Rate the following 1--- 5. With 1 being poor and 5 Confident.
Shot calling: 5
How well you know you role: 5
Dedication/commitment: 5
Do you like to talk: 5
Do you prefer to listen: 5 ( like to listen to new ideas and strategies also love giving them)

IGN: StellaKurtois
Rank in all season you played: s3: gold 3, s4, d5
Top ADC(at least 3): Caitlyn, Draven , sivir, love vayne as well
Timezone/Availability: cst, student but i play everyday.
Competitive experience: Been in some university tournaments as well as mobafire tournaments
Can you shot call? kinda, on my last competitative teams it was both junglers.
Shot calling: 3.5
How well you know you role: 4.5
Dedication/commitment: 5
Do you like to talk: 4
Do you prefer to listen: 4
i do both.
